short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Online Video Downloader. Free, Fast, Quick, Easy way to download any video from any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FOVD: Free Online Video Downloader is the Chrome extension that reimagines your video downloading journey, offering a free and easy-to-use service that caters to all your video downloader needs. This user-friendly tool ensures a swift download process from a wide array of websites.


Below are the core FEATURES that set FOVD apart:

-Dynamic Video Download Notification: When downloadable video content is detected, the FOVD icon turns green, indicating that videos are ready to be downloaded for free. This smart feature ensures you are always aware of when and where videos are available for download.

-Streamlined Popup Interface: Clicking on the FOVD extension icon unveils a user-friendly popup that allows you to:

-Instant Video Previews: Confirm the content with a quick preview, ensuring it's the video you want before you download.

-Visible File Sizes: Know the size of the video files prior to downloading the video, allowing for better data and storage management.

-Customizable File Naming: Easily rename your downloads, streamlining your media organization.

-One-Tap Fast Download: Utilize the Q & W keyboard shortcuts to instantly start downloading the largest video file available, speeding up the process considerably. (You need not even open the popup for this!!!)

-Comprehensive Site Compatibility: As a free video downloader, FOVD operates across a plethora of websites, broadening your video download options without compromising speed or usability.

-Cost-Free Downloading: FOVD offers a video download experience that is completely free, ideal for those who require a quick and convenient video downloader without any charges.


Ethical Video Downloading Practices: FOVD respects the content sharing legal framework, including the terms of service of video hosting platforms. The extension does not support downloading from YouTube, honoring its policy restrictions.

FOVD: Free Online Video Downloader is your essential tool for quickly downloading videos without any cost. It's designed for the varied needs of users, from students and professionals to casual video enthusiasts who want to enhance their video libraries with ease. It serves as a reliable extension for accessing a multitude of videos across different sites.

*NOTE, the extension is not meant for usage on YouTube due to terms of service, downloading from YouTube is not facilitated by this extension.
